title: Step2 LifeStyle™ Fresh Accents Kitchen
description: The Fresh Accents Kitchen by Step2 is a fun-sized play kitchen for kids! Kids can play with the electronic microwave, stove top and 30 piece accessory set. This compact kid's play kitchen can be used in the playroom or kid's bedroom.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description:
The Fresh Accents Kitchen by Step2 is a fun-sized play kitchen for kids! Kids can play with the electronic microwave, stove top and 30 piece accessory set. This compact kid's play kitchen can be used in the playroom or kid's bedroom.

Learn more at: http://www.step2.com/p/LifeStyle-Fresh-Accents-Kitchen

transcripts: Want to add a whole lot of fun to a small space. The Step2 lifestyle Fresh Accents Kitchen is sleek and compact yet packed with many activities and lots of accessories. Designed to compliment today's gourmet kitchens, it has appealing earth-tone colors and upscale detailing.  The peek through window adds a new level of imaginative play and also let's you keep an eye on the action. the LifeStyle Fresh Accents Kitchen will keep your little chef busy for hours. The fridge has a built in water dispenser and plenty of storage space inside. The oven, cupboards, and microwaves offer additional storage. This kitchen also includes a coffee pot with a built in coffee maker.  The stove top burner has a special frying pan and boiling pot that active sizzling and boiling sounds adding a realistic touch to pretend play. The microwave also heats up the fun with an electronic keypad. When cooking is done, you're little one can practice washing dishes in the deep sink with movable faucet. This kitchen comes with a full st of accessories. Like all Step2 toys, the LifeStyle Fresh Accents Kitchen is durably built for years of worry free play.
